content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord, Peter Schmidt: It's my pleasure to show such a prime location in the city center, Ms. Wang. However, as a landlord, I must ensure I get the best price possible for my property. Let's see where our negotiations take us regarding the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As a smart and responsible person, I am aware of the market value of the apartment. I think a price of 300 Euro per month is appropriate for the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As an uncompromising landlord, I regret to say that I had expected a higher return on my investment due to this apartment's exceptional location and features. 250 Euro per month would be a more suitable price in my opinion. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm determined to maximize my profit.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point of view. However, I have found similar apartments in the city center for a price of 300 Euro per month. Therefore, I believe 300 Euro per month is the fairest price for the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
TERMINATE 

In this scenario, the landlord, Peter Schmidt, did not accept the proposed rental price of 300 Euro per month from the prospective tenant, Yi-Nuo Wang. He insisted on a lower price of 250 Euro per month due to his desire to maximize his profit. The negotiation was then terminated as the two parties did not reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
